general.internal_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support.
general.not_found: The requested resource does not exist.
general.forbidden: You do not have sufficient permissions to perform this operation.

company.not_found: The requested company could not be found.
company.create_error: Could not create company. Tax ID might be duplicated.

property.not_found: The specified property was not found.
property.active_contracts: Cannot delete a property that has active contracts.
property.invalid_status: The property status does not allow this action.

tenant.not_found: The tenant does not exist in our database.
tenant.already_exists: A tenant with this ID is already registered.

contract.overlap: The selected dates overlap with an existing contract.
contract.invalid_dates: The end date cannot be earlier than the start date.

billing.invoice_generation_error: Error generating invoice. Please check fiscal data.
billing.payment_failed: Payment process could not be completed.
